definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: It is the emblematic red grape of Argentinean. Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，树莓，樱桃和李子的芬芳浓郁，呈酱紫色。

sentences.english: I always add a little Madeira to the liquid when I stew prunes.
sentences.chinese: 在炖李子时我常加些马德拉葡萄酒在汤里。

sentences.english: These kinds of jinn can be killed with date or plum stones fired from a sling.
sentences.chinese: 可以用弹弓发射枣核或者李子核射杀这几种精灵。

sentences.english: These red little Japanese plums add a perky taste to stir-frys and soups.
sentences.chinese: 这种红色的日本小李子在炒菜和放汤时，味道很带劲。

sentences.english: In England, the best plums are grown in Kent and the Vale of Evesham.
sentences.chinese: 在英格兰，最上乘的李子种植在肯特和伊弗珊谷。

sentences.english: Smooth tannins texture combined with blackcurrant, plum, dried date and oak.
sentences.chinese: 丹宁柔和，充满黑醋栗，李子，干枣和橡木味道。

sentences.english: B: It looks best in spring, when the plum and cherry blossoms are out.
sentences.chinese: 温带核果植物像樱桃，桃子和李子也有受冻的危险。

sentences.english: The oldest plum tree dates back to 2500 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 最古老的李子树可以追溯到2500多年前。

sentences.english: Beautifully balanced with red fruit and plum flavors followed by a wood sensation.
sentences.chinese: 红果与李子的口味在橡木味道衬托下颇为平衡。

sentences.english: Medium-bodied, with attractive ripe plum and fruit aromas on the nose, which carry through to the palate.
sentences.chinese: 中度酒体，闻味和品尝都有明显的李子和水果味道。

sentences.english: Well, she said, plums are smaller and round.
sentences.chinese: “哦，”她说，“李子小一点儿但很圆。”

sentences.english: Liziba village lies in Baishuijiang National Nature Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 李子坝村地处白水江国家级自然保护区内。

sentences.english: The white strip pig hanging in the Li subtree.
sentences.chinese: 将白条条的猪挂在李子树上。

sentences.english: The fruit vendor told her plums of black-red color were very sweet.
sentences.chinese: 卖水果的小贩告诉她，红青的李子很甜。

sentences.english: Black plums and spice on the nose, deep and rich.
sentences.chinese: 李子和辛辣味在鼻子底下表现明显，浓郁且丰富。

definition: blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
Yangmei town in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
red bayberry/Chinese bayberry/Japanese bayberry/Myrica rubra/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
